location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Captain George Brown Walker, Commanding HC Cruizer Benaresor The Senior Marine Officer at Bassidore [Bāsa’īdū]

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a packet with an urgent despatch from Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald, which it is hoped will reach Bassidore [Bāsa’īdū] in time for the Elphinstoneto take it, and that if not that it could be sent by Cruizer to the care of the Native Agent at Muscat.
